resources.string: Date can\'t more than current date

The Rat zodiac symbolizes cleverness, agility, and sharp intuition. They are known as quick thinkers, thrifty, and highly adaptable in various situations. People with this sign tend to be smart in seizing opportunities and skilled in communication and social interaction.

The Ox zodiac represents perseverance, reliability, and hard work. They are diligent, patient, and have a strong sense of responsibility. People with this sign are usually trustworthy and consistent in achieving their goals.

The Tiger zodiac symbolizes courage, strength, and natural charisma. They possess strong leadership qualities and are not afraid to take risks. People with this sign are energetic, confident, and brave in standing up for what they believe in.

The Rabbit zodiac is known for its gentleness, attentiveness, and peaceful nature. They are sensitive, friendly, and diplomatic in social relationships. People with this sign tend to avoid conflict and value beauty and comfort in life.

The Dragon zodiac reflects strength, ambition, and extraordinary charisma. They are born leaders with the courage to pursue big dreams. People with this sign tend to be confident, passionate, and authoritative.

The Snake zodiac symbolizes wisdom, mystery, and calmness. They are deep thinkers, intuitive, and often keep their plans well organized. People with this sign are elegant, strategic, and highly analytical in decision-making.

The Horse zodiac is known for being energetic, independent, and freedom-loving. They are dynamic, optimistic, and quick to act. People with this sign enjoy new challenges and have a strong adventurous spirit.

The Goat zodiac symbolizes gentleness, empathy, and artistic talent. They are sensitive to others\' feelings and have a knack for the arts. People with this sign tend to be patient, caring, and deeply concerned with the well-being of those around them.

The Monkey zodiac is known for intelligence, humor, and resourcefulness. They learn quickly, love challenges, and adapt easily. People with this sign often become the center of attention due to their unique ideas and creative thinking.

The Rooster zodiac symbolizes precision, courage, and high discipline. They are honest, hardworking, and often perfectionists. People with this sign have strong organizational skills and are not afraid to voice their opinions.
The Dog zodiac is known for loyalty, honesty, and fairness. They deeply care about truth and justice. People with this sign tend to be trustworthy, sincere, and always ready to help others in need.

The Pig zodiac represents sincerity, generosity, and warmth. They are honest, gentle, and like to help others. People with this sign enjoy a comfortable and peaceful life and always value honesty and friendship.

"Show Your Shio" is an application to discover your Chinese zodiac based on your birth year. The Chinese zodiac is an astrological system used by the Chinese ethnic group. It consists of twelve animals as symbols of the birth year. These twelve zodiac signs are arranged in order and rotate every 12 years. Therefore, in the 13th year, the same zodiac animal symbol will reappear.
